document.full_text: police in arizona have arrested 25 suspected members of a mexican drug cartel, significantly hampering the group's ability to smuggle drugs and illegal immigrants from mexico, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: police break up arizona-mexico drug smuggling network
lines_and_colors: police in arizona have arrested 25 suspected members of a mexican drug cartel, significantly hampering the group's ability to smuggle drugs and illegal immigrants from mexico, authorities said on thursday.
